text: yakisoba is Japanese fast-food that came
from China sorta stir-fried noodles with
vegetables and meat made a million
different ways and if you ask 10
Japanese people what yakisoba is you're
going to get 10 different answers here's
the 11th answer mine there is three
things that are always in yakisoba you
can say this noodles vegetables and some
kind of weird sauce I mean this is
condiment cooking in a way because the

we'll get to that in a second we're
going to start with some peanut oil or
you could use a neutral oil like

this ad in the pan so it Browns

while that's doing its thing you can

tablespoons of the highest possible
